mapper.select: SELECT no, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(board pk_board) */ no, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate FROM board ) as T LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{pageEnd};
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, updateDate=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE no=#{no};
